attributes.action: Accept that 'climate change' is not soley from humans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now you could call me a cynic, but do i sniff a hidden way creating extra tax payments from us all? Is everyone really    buying into 'climate change' as we are led to believe? Or we going to create an opposition to a consenus (from where or who i do not know), to argue that this is not a tool to raise taxes and natural factors are at play around the planet that no  national/world policy would have any impact on globaly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
